title: Fix impact metric to show States Served instead of Countries Served

requirements.text: Update the impact metric copy so it no longer claims the NGO serves 15 countries; it should clearly indicate 15 states served instead (English text). Apply this change anywhere the site currently displays this specific metric.

quotes: Countries Served 15 country is not only State in 15

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page impact metrics strip, the metric with value "15" no longer uses the label "Countries" and instead uses "States" or "States Served".

On the Programs/Impact page "Collective Impact" summary, the metric with value "15" no longer displays "Countries Served" and instead displays "States Served" (or equivalent wording that clearly indicates states, not countries).
No other impact metric values are changed.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Do not change the numeric value (15) for the metric.
Do not add new backend fields or endpoints for this change.
